definition: to hesitate over what move to make (idiom); to waver/to shilly-shally

(negative prefix)/not/no
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: She is vacillated between her two admirers .
sentences.chinese: 在兩個追求者之間，她舉棋不定。

sentences.chinese: 在兩個追求者之間，她舉棋不定。

sentences.english: Caution is one thing and waving is another.
sentences.chinese: 謹慎小心和舉棋不定是兩碼事。

sentences.english: We're looking for the shoppers on the fence." she added.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在尋找那些還在舉棋不定的購物者們。

sentences.english: Gold always decides to request Di Jie to help when hesitate.
sentences.chinese: 金總在舉棋不定時決定請求狄傑幫忙。

sentences.english: Investors face added uncertainty because of China's reputation for fakes and poor authentication.
sentences.chinese: 面對中國假冒仿製品的充斥，投資者也有些舉棋不定。
他在兩種意見之間舉棋不定。
